;;;InsertDefinedLilyPond (let ((directives '()) (definitions #f) (choice #f)) (define (get-second-line text) (let ((thelist (string-split text #\newline))) (if (> (length thelist) 1) (list-ref thelist 1) ""))) (define (extract-menuitem tag) (define name (get-second-line tag)) (cons name (lambda () (d-DirectivePut-standalone name) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-postfix name (string-append "\\" name " ")) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-display name name)(d-DirectivePut-standalone-minpixels name 30))))
(let loop ((count 1)) (define good-tag (d-Directive-score? (string-append "Allow\n" (number->string count)))) (if good-tag (begin (set! directives (cons good-tag directives)) (loop (1+ count))))) (if (not (null? directives)) (set! definitions (map extract-menuitem directives))) (if definitions (set! choice (d-PopupMenu definitions)) (d-WarningDialog (_ "No Definitions have been created for this score"))) (if choice (begin (choice) (d-RefreshDisplay) (d-SetSaved #f))))
row._tooltip: Gives a menu of previously created LilyPondDefinition commands (see Score->LilyPond Definition menu for this)
